article_title: Revenue To Grow On New Business Bookings, Employment

article_metadata.description: We expect the human capital management company to have grown on the improving employment conditions in the U.S., business bookings from the previous quarter and purchases of solutions for compliance with the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.
article_metadata.author: Great Speculations
